input.sentences: there was a running marathon today .
it was great seeing the seniors running .
the view was also beautiful as they ran .
afterward | we had some soup and bread .
there were also a bunch of snacks and food for after the run .
output.sentences: Today I ran my first marathon!
All kinds of people were running; some young, some old.
Some of the views along the run were breathtakingly beautiful.
After the marathon we were given a hearty meal of hot soup and bread.
We were also given delicious snacks.
